content:
# HN AI/ML Report

## Crawl Summary
- Pages crawled: 5 (front pages p1–p3 plus the newest feed and its “next” page)
- Total stories found: 150 (≈30 per crawl)
- AI stories found: 35

## Top 5 AI Stories
1. **Anthropic acquires Bun** – 2077 points, 996 comments (front page p1)
2. **Mistral 3 family of models released** – 785 points, 219 comments (front page p3)
3. **Zig quits GitHub, says Microsoft’s AI obsession has ruined the service** – 783 points, 440 comments (front page p1)
4. **OpenAI declares “code red” as Google catches up in AI race** – 775 points, 856 comments (front page p2)
5. **IBM CEO says there is “no way” spending on AI data centers will pay off** – 767 points, 872 comments (front page p2)

## Trends
The front pages are dominated by high-stakes AI headlines: mega-round valuations and acquisitions (Anthropic/Bun, IPO chatter), hardware pushes (Trainium3, AI data centers), and cautious hot takes on AI risk (IBM, Microsoft, Zig). The “newest” feeds surface a flurry of experimentation—Show HN tools for agents, embeddings, redaction, and LLM reliability studies—plus emerging security and governance discussions around prompt injection and fraud. Overall, AI coverage is split between massive corporate narratives and a grassroots burst of smaller-scale LLM utilities/security explorations.
